GR13sivmstpu:0: mahimnaḥ pāraṃ te paramaviduṣo yady asadṛśī stutir brahmādīnām api tadavasannās tvayi giraḥ
GR13sivmstpu:1: athāvācyaḥ sarvaḥ svamatipariṇāmāvadhi gṛṇan mamāpy eṣa stotre hara nirapavādaḥ parikaraḥ || Smst_1
GR13sivmstpu:2: atītaḥ panthānaṃ tava ca mahimā vāṅmanasayor atadvyāvṛttyā yaṃ cakitam abhidhatte śrutir api
GR13sivmstpu:3: sa kasya stotavyaḥ katividhaguṇaḥ kasya viṣayaḥ pade tv arvācīne patati na manaḥ kasya na vacaḥ || Smst_2
GR13sivmstpu:4: madhusphītā vācaḥ paramam amṛtaṃ nirmitavatas tava brahman kiṃ vāg api suraguror vismayapadam
GR13sivmstpu:5: mama tv etāṃ vāṇīṃ guṇakathanapuṇyena bhavataḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:6: punāmīty arthe 'smin puramathana buddhir vyavasitā || Smst_3
GR13sivmstpu:7: tavaiśvaryaṃ yat taj jagadudayarakṣāpralayakṛt trayīvastu vyastaṃ tisṛṣu guṇabhinnāsu tanuṣu
GR13sivmstpu:8: abhavyānām asmin varada ramaṇīyām aramaṇīṃ vihantuṃ vyākrośīṃ vidadhata ihaike jaḍadhiyaḥ || Smst_4
GR13sivmstpu:9: kimīhaḥ kiṃkāyaḥ sa khalu kimupāyas tribhuvanaṃ kimādhāro dhātā sṛjati kimupādāna iti ca |
GR13sivmstpu:10: atarkyaiśvarye tvayy anavasaraduḥstho hatadhiyaḥ kutarko 'yaṃ kāṃścin mukharayati mohāya jagataḥ || Smst_5
GR13sivmstpu:11: ajanmāno lokāḥ kim avayavavanto 'pi jagatām adhiṣṭhātāraṃ kiṃ bhavavidhir anādṛtya bhavati
GR13sivmstpu:12: anīśo vā kuryād bhuvanajanane kaḥ parikaro yato mandās tvāṃ praty amaravara saṃśerata ime || Smst_6
GR13sivmstpu:13: trayī sāṃkhyaṃ yogaḥ paśupatimataṃ vaiṣṇavam iti prabhinne prasthāne param idam adaḥ pathyam iti ca |
GR13sivmstpu:14: rucīnāṃ vaicitryād ṛjukuṭilanānāpathajuṣāṃ nṛṇām eko gamyas tvam asi payasām arṇava iva ||
GR13sivmstpu:15: mahokṣaḥ khaṭvāṅgaṃ paraśur ajinaṃ bhasma phaṇinaḥ kapālaṃ cetīyat tava varada tantropakaraṇam
GR13sivmstpu:16: surās tāṃ tām ṛddhiṃ dadhati tu bhavadbhrūpraṇihitāṃ na hi svātmārāmaṃ viṣayamṛgatṛṣṇā bhramayati || Smst_8
GR13sivmstpu:17: dhruvaṃ kaścit sarvaṃ sakalam aparas tv adhruvam idaṃ paro dhrauvyādhrauvye jagati gadati vyastaviṣaye |
GR13sivmstpu:18: samaste 'py etasmin puramathana tair vismita iva stuvañ jihremi tvāṃ na khalu nanu dhṛṣṭā mukharatā || Smst_9
GR13sivmstpu:19: tavaiśvaryaṃ yatnād yad upari viriñco harir adhaḥ paricchettuṃ yātāv analam analaskandhavapuṣaḥ
GR13sivmstpu:20: tato bhaktiśraddhābharagurugṛṇadbhyāṃ giriśa yat svayaṃ tasthe tābhyāṃ tava kim anuvṛttir na phalati || Smst_10
GR13sivmstpu:21: ayatnād āpādya tribhuvanam avairavyatikaraṃ daśāsyo yad bāhūn abhṛta raṇakaṇḍūparavaśān |
GR13sivmstpu:22: śiraḥpadmaśreṇīracitacaraṇāmbhoruhabaleḥ sthirāyās tvadbhaktes tripurahara visphūrjitam idam amuṣya tvatsevāsamadhigatasāraṃ bhujavanaṃ balāt kailāse 'pi tvadadhivasatau vikramayataḥ
GR13sivmstpu:23: alabhyā pātāle 'py alasacalitāṅguṣṭhaśirasi pratiṣṭhā tvayy āsīd dhruvam upacito muhyati khalaḥ yadṛddhiṃ sutrāmṇo varada paramoccair api satīm adhaś cakre bāṇaḥ parijanavidheyatribhuvanaḥ
GR13sivmstpu:24: na tac citraṃ tasmin varivasitari tvaccaraṇayor na kasyā unnatyai bhavati śirasas tvayy avanatiḥ akāṇḍabrahmāṇḍakṣayacakitadevāsurakṛpā vidheyasyāsīd yas trinayana viṣaṃ saṃhṛtavataḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:25: na kalmāṣaḥ kaṇṭhe tava na kurute na śriyam aho vikāro 'pi ślāghyo bhuvananbhayabhaṅgavyasaninaḥ asiddhārthā naiva kvacid api sadevāsuranare nivartante nityaṃ jagati jayino yasya viśikhāḥ
GR13sivmstpu:26: sa paśyan īśa tvām itarasurasādhāraṇam abhūt smaraḥ smartavyātmā na hi vaśiṣu pathyaḥ paribhavaḥ mahī pādāghātād vrajati sahasā saṃśayapadaṃ padaṃ viṣṇor bhrāmyadbhujaparigharugṇagrahagaṇam
GR13sivmstpu:27: muhur dyaur dauḥsthyaṃ yāty anibhṛtajaṭātāḍitataṭā jagadrakṣāyai tvaṃ naṭasi nanu vāmaiva vibhutā || Smst_16
GR13sivmstpu:28: viyadvyāpī tārāgaṇaguṇitaphenodgamaruciḥ pravāho vārāṃ yaḥ pṛṣ.atalaghudṛṣṭaḥ śirasi te |
GR13sivmstpu:29: jagad dvīpākāraṃ jaladhivalayaṃ tena kṛtam ity anenaivonneyaṃ dhṛtamahima divyaṃ tava vapuḥ rathaḥ kṣoṇī yantā śatadhṛtir agendro dhanur atho rathāṅge candrārkau rathacaraṇapāṇiḥ śara iti |
GR13sivmstpu:30: didhakṣos te ko 'yaṃ tripuratṛṇam āḍambaravidhir vidheyaiḥ krīḍantyo na khalu paratantrāḥ prabhudhiyaḥ || Smst_18
GR13sivmstpu:31: haris te sāhasraṃ kamalabalim ādhāya padayor yad ekone tasmin nijam udaharan netrakamalam
GR13sivmstpu:32: gato bhaktyudrekaḥ pariṇatim asau cakravapuṣā trayāṇāṃ rakṣāyai tripurahara jāgarti jagatām kratau supte jāgrat tvam asi phalayoge kratumatāṃ kva karma pradhvastaṃ palati puruṣārādhanam ṛte |
GR13sivmstpu:33: atas tvāṃ samprekṣya tratuṣu phaladānapratibhuvaṃ śrutau śraddhāṃ baddhvā dṛḍhaparikaraḥ karmasu janaḥ || Smst_20
GR13sivmstpu:34: kriyādakṣo dakṣaḥ kratupatir adhīśas tanubhṛtām ṛṣīṇām ārtvijyaṃ śaraṇada sadasyāḥ suragaṇāḥ
GR13sivmstpu:35: kratubhraṃśas tvattaḥ kratuphalavidhānavyasanino dhruvaṃ kartuḥ śraddhāvidhuram abhicārāya hi makhāḥ || Smst_21
GR13sivmstpu:36: prajānāthaṃ prasabham abhikaṃ svāṃ duhitaraṃ gataṃ rohidbhūtāṃ riramayiṣum ṛśyasya vapuṣā
GR13sivmstpu:37: dhanuṣpāṇer yātaṃ divam api sapatrākṛtam amuṃ trasantaṃ te 'dyāpi tyajati na mṛgavyādharabhasaḥ svalāvaṇyāśaṃsādhṛtadhanuṣam ahnāya tṛṇavat puraḥ pluṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā puramathana puṣpāyudham api
GR13sivmstpu:38: yadi straiṇaṃ yamanirata dehārdhaghaṭanād avaiti tvām addhā bata varada mugdhā yuvatayaḥ ||
GR13sivmstpu:39: śmaśāneṣv ākrīḍā smarahara piśācāḥ sahacarāś citābhasmālepaḥ srag api nṛkaroṭīparikaraḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:40: amāṅgalyaṃ śīlaṃ tava bhavatu nāmaivam akhilaṃ tathāpi smart.Rṇāṃ varada paramaṃ maṅgalam asi || Smst_24
GR13sivmstpu:41: manaḥ pratyakcitte savidham avadhāyāttamarutaḥ prahṛṣyadromāṇaḥ pramadasalilotsaṅgitadṛśaḥ
GR13sivmstpu:42: yad ālokyāhlādaṃ hrada iva nimajyāmṛtamaye dadhaty antas tattvaṃ kim api yaminas tat kila bhavān || Smst_25
GR13sivmstpu:43: tvam arkas tvaṃ somas tvam asi pavanas tvaṃ hutavahas tvam āpas tvaṃ vyoma tvam u dharaṇir ātmā tvam iti ca |
GR13sivmstpu:44: paricchinnām evaṃ tvayi pariṇatā bibhrati giraṃ na vidmas tat tattvaṃ vayam iha tu yat tvaṃ na bhavasi || Smst_26
GR13sivmstpu:45: trayīṃ tisro vṛttīs tribhuvanam atho trīn api surān nakārādyair varṇais tribhir abhidadhat tīrṇavikṛti |
GR13sivmstpu:46: turīyaṃ te dhāma dhvanibhir avarundhānam aṇubhiḥ samastaṃ vyastaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇada gṛṇātīm iti padam || Smst_27
GR13sivmstpu:47: bhavaḥ śarvo rudraḥ paśupatir athograḥ sahamahāṃs tathā bhīmeśānāv iti yad abhidhānāṣṭakam idam |
GR13sivmstpu:48: amuṣmin pratyekaṃ pravicarati deva śrutir api priyāyāsmai dhāmne praṇihitanamasyo 'smi bhavate namo nediṣṭhāya priyadava daviṣṭhāya ca namo namaḥ kṣodiṣṭhāya smarahara mahiṣṭhāya ca namaḥ
GR13sivmstpu:49: namo varṣiṣṭhāya trinayana yaviṣṭhāya ca namo namaḥ sarvasmai te tad idam iti sarvāya ca namaḥ bahularajase viśvotpattau bhavāya namo namaḥ prabalatamase tatsaṃhāre harāya namo namaḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:50: janasukhakṛte sattvotpattau mṛdāya namo namaḥ pramahasi pade nistraiguṇye śivāya namo namaḥ kṛśapariṇati cetaḥ kleśavaśyaṃ kva cedaṃ kva ca tava guṇasīmollaṅghinī śāśvadṛddhiḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:51: iti cakitam anandīkṛtya māṃ bhaktir ādhād varaca caraṇayos te vākyapuṣpopahāram || Smst_31
GR13sivmstpu:52: % pariśiṣṭam: Additional verses in all MSS (!!) but not in the inscription
GR13sivmstpu:53: asitagirisamaṃ syāt kajjalaṃ sindhupātre surataruvaraśākhā lekhanī patram urvī |
GR13sivmstpu:54: likhati yadi gṛhītvā śāradā sarvakālaṃ tad api tava guṇānām īśa pāraṃ na yāti || Smst_Add_1
GR13sivmstpu:56: sakalaguṇavariṣṭhaḥ puṣpadantābhidhāno ruciram alaghuvṛttaiḥ stotram etac cakāra || Smst_Add_2
GR13sivmstpu:57: aharāhar anavadyaṃ dhūrjaṭe stotram etat paṭhati paramabhaktyā śuddhacittaḥ pumān yaḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:58: sa bhavati śivaloke rudratulyaḥ sadātmā pracurataradhanāyuḥ putravān kīrtimāṃś ca || Smst_Add_3
GR13sivmstpu:59: maheśān nāparo devo mahimno nāparā stutiḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:60: aghorān nāparo mantro nāsti tattvaṃ guroḥ param || Smst_Add_4
GR13sivmstpu:61: dīkṣā dānaṃ tapas tīrthaṃ jñānaṃ yāgādikāḥ kriyāḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:62: mahimnas tava pāṭhasya kalāṃ nārhanti ṣoḍaśīm || Smst_Add_5
GR13sivmstpu:66: sa khalu nijamahimno bhraṣṭa evāsya roṣāt stavanam idam akārṣīd divyadivyaṃ mahimnaḥ || Smst_Add_7
GR13sivmstpu:67: suragurum abhipūjya svargamokṣaikahetuṃ paṭhati yadi manuṣyaḥ prāñjalir nānyacetāḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:68: vrajati śivasamīpaṃ kinnaraiḥ stūyamānaḥ stavanam idam amoghaṃ puṣpadantapraṇītam || Smst_Add_8
GR13sivmstpu:70: kaṇṭhasthitena paṭhitena gṛhasthitena samprīṇito bhavati bhūtapatir maheśaḥ || Smst_Add_9
GR13sivmstpu:71: apūrvaṃ lāvaṇyaṃ vivasanatanos te vimṛṣatāṃ munīnāṃ dārāṇāṃ samajani sa ko 'py avyatikaraḥ
GR13sivmstpu:72: yato bhagne guhye sakṛd api saparyāṃ vidadhatāṃ dhruvaṃ mokṣaṃ līlāṃ kim api puruṣārthaṃ prasavite vapuḥprādurbhāvād anumitam idaṃ janmani purā purāre naivāhaṃ kvacid api bhavantaṃ praṇatavān
GR13sivmstpu:73: naman muktaḥ sampraty atanur aham agre 'py anatimān maheśa kṣantavyaṃ tad idam aparādhadvayam api || Smst_Add_11
GR13sivmstpu:75: arpitā tena deveśaḥ prīyatāṃ me sadāśivaḥ || Smst_Add_12
GR13sivmstpu:76: tava tattvaṃ na jānāmi kīdṛśo 'si maheśvara |
GR13sivmstpu:77: yādṛśo 'si mahādeva tādṛśāya namo namaḥ || Smst_Add_13
GR13sivmstpu:78: ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ |
GR13sivmstpu:80: kīrtanena hi rudrasya pāpaṃ yāti sahasradhā |
